Name: Fat Sailor
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A tasty, suitably calorie laden, rum concoction.
History: Tiki style drink of unknown origin.
Nutrition: One serving of Fat Sailor contains 197 calories
